document_data.name: Elder
document_data.mainbody: The '''Elder''' was a respected priest of the [[Faceless God]] and the governor of the [[Enlightened Ring]] province in the [[World Pillar Mountains]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Activities: As with the other members of the [[Seven Sages]], the Elder was an appointed governor of one of the provinces of the [[Yikarian Empire]]. He kept most of his slaves, who were predominantly [[dwarves]], deep underground mining for riches. Many never saw the light of day.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Many [[Yak-folk|yikarians]] believed the Elder was the first son of the Faceless God.
